description:
Fixed: Various bugfixes
Added: Viewer, Album Organizer, Photo Organizer, Pan&Zoom, Auto-Update, sorting options

Slide Master allows you to build slideshows quickly and easily from all your local photos.  Caption your pictures easily and then play your slideshow immediately.  Works beautifully in both app mode and Exhibition Mode.

Fully supports all devices running at least webOS 2.0, including the Pre, the Pre Plus, the Pre 2, the Pre 3, the Veer, and the TouchPad.

On the main screen:
•Tap to select/unselect any number of albums to use as a source (TouchPad users have access to their Synergy photos). Use the Checkmark/Cancel icons to select/deselect all.
•Tap the Save/Discard icons to save/discard your current changes.
•Tap & hold on an individual album for a submenu:
- Organize Photos (edit details including title, date, visibility, and sort order).
- Review All Photos (tap to show/hide any photo).
- Review Hidden Photos.
- Clear Hidden Photos for only that specific album.
•Tap the Play button to start your slideshow.

In the slideshow:
•Randomize with a quick shake.
•Flick left to go backward or flick right to go forward in the slideshow.
•Flick up to hide the current photo from the slideshow.

Tap to pause the slideshow and enter Pan & Zoom mode:
•Double-tap or pinch/unpinch to zoom into the current photo.

Access the submenu for additional features:
•Hide this picture from the slideshow.
•Change the title with your own caption.
•Pick any JPG or PNG photo to use as your Wallpaper.
•Temporarily re-sort the slideshow.
•Send an email with any photo.
•Send an MMS with any JPG photo.
•Go directly to any photo.

Additional features:
•Adjust the type of transition, the amount of time between the photos, and the order of the photos.
•Add titles for the photo or the album, and choose how the photos are displayed (centered, zoomed, or stretched).

»We welcome any & all feedback at slidemaster@appsotutely.com«
Available in: English
